title: Crack In The Road Exclusive Mix #3: Drugg
content:
Gaining a rapidly expanding fan base both in London and throughout the rest of the UK, Drugg is one of the most exciting artists in the witch haus scene at the moment. We were delighted when he agreed to put together an Exclusive Mix for Crack in the Road. Combining arguably the most diverse track selection of our three mixes so far, it’s a really fantastic listen and is available to hear below.

Drugg – Crack in the Road Exclusive Mix #3 by crackintheroad

Tracklisting:

Black Dice – Urban Supermist
Lukid – Hair of the Dog
Minutemen – Paranoid Chant
Earl Sweatshirt – Earl
Women – Untogether
Grouper – Heavy Water/I’d Rather be Sleeping
Lizzy Mercier Descloux – Room Mate
Mohammed Al Madloul – unknown
Cybertron – Clear
David Axelrod – The Smile
MF Doom – Saliva
Dinosaur – Gargoyle
Seefeel – Dead Guitars
Fadimoutou Wallet Inamoud – Unknown
Cocteau Twins – Lorelei
Gil Scott Heron – B Movie
Group Home – Supa Star
Jacaszek – Rytm to Niesmiertelnosc
Teebs – You’ve Changed

If you haven’t heard any of Drugg’s music, then check it out here. Also keep checking back for our interview with Drugg in a couple of weeks time, when we’ll catch up with him at The Old Blue Last.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
